Cherrycake\Modules\Session::loadSessionCookie

loadSessionCookie

Finds the current session's cookie and loads $this->sessionId.

    Signature

    public function loadSessionCookie()

    Returns

    boolean
    True if the session cookie could be retrieved, false if the session cookie does not exists (no session present).
